pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Natural Vitamin E Body Lotion 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Natural Vitamin E Body Lotion delivers daily moisturisation to improve the appearance of dry, damaged or cracked skin, uneven skin tone and chafed skin. Made with natural Vitamin E, Cocoa Butter and an advanced botanical blend to effectively soothe and nourish skin all over the body.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation develops, discontinue use. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

Common Uses

Specially formulated with the natural benefits of cocoa butter, avocado, apricot and coconut oils. Provides 24 hour moisture. Fragrance Free. No artificial colours, parabens or phthalates. Dermatologically tested.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tocopherol, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, PEG-100 Stearate, Sodium Polycrylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethyl Lauroyl Arginate HCI, Tetrasodium EDTA, Lecithin, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Beta-Carotene (CI 40800).

Directions

Apply daily, all over body.
